title: Swagger Target Generator
description: Add a swagger target to a webapi based project to extract swagger.json into a newly generated library project.  Optionally, also creates a project for code generation of the extracted swagger specification.

swaggerDoc.description: Which version of the swagger spec should be used?

startupAssembly.description: Path from workspace root to the built api's startup dll file. If null, will be auto-discovered.

project.description: Which project should the target be added to?

target.description: What should the swagger target be called?

swaggerProject.description: What should the swagger project be called?

codegenProject.description: What should the codegen project be called? If null, the project will not be created.

useNxPluginOpenAPI.description: If the codegen project is to be created, should the codegen target use nx-plugin-openapi instead?  Choose false if only type interfaces are needed.
